# Load data

```{r, include=FALSE}
redownload <- FALSE

if (redownload){
  src_folder <- 'U:/src/pymc-survival/examples/experiments/results_retrain'
  
  
  data.exp <- rbind(
    read.csv(paste(src_folder, 'pm_exp_gbcs/ovi.csv', sep = '/')) %>% mutate(experiment = 'gbcs'),
    read.csv(paste(src_folder, 'pm_exp_whas/ovi.csv', sep = '/')) %>% mutate(experiment = 'whas'),
    read.csv(paste(src_folder, 'pm_exp_pbc/ovi.csv', sep = '/')) %>% mutate(experiment = 'pbc'),
    read.csv(paste(src_folder, 'pm_exp_aids/ovi.csv', sep = '/')) %>% mutate(experiment = 'actg')
  )
  
  
  data.wb <- rbind(
    read.csv(paste(src_folder, 'pm_wb_gbcs/ovi.csv', sep = '/')) %>% mutate(experiment = 'gbcs', model = 'pm_wb'),
    read.csv(paste(src_folder, 'pm_wb_whas/ovi.csv', sep = '/')) %>% mutate(experiment = 'whas', model = 'pm_wb'),
    read.csv(paste(src_folder, 'pm_wb_pbc/ovi.csv', sep = '/')) %>% mutate(experiment = 'pbc', model = 'pm_wb'),
    read.csv(paste(src_folder, 'pm_wb_aids/ovi.csv', sep = '/')) %>% mutate(experiment = 'actg', model = 'pm_wb')
  )
  
  data <- rbind(data.exp, data.wb)
  
  data <- data %>% 
    mutate(
      experiment_lbl = as.factor(experiment),
      model_lbl = as.factor(model)
    )
  
  save(data, file = 'data/ovi.rds')
}
```

```{r}
load(file = 'data/ovi.rds')
```


# Functions

```{r}
plot_ovi <- function(.data, experiment_str, model_str){
  
  data.grouped <- .data %>%
    filter(experiment == experiment_str) %>%
    mutate(
      var_lbl = as.factor(var)
    ) %>%
    group_by(experiment_lbl, model_lbl, var_lbl, partition) %>%
    summarise(
      n = n(),
      median = median(ovi),
      median_lower = wilcox.test(ovi, conf.int = TRUE)$conf.int[1],
      median_upper = wilcox.test(ovi, conf.int = TRUE)$conf.int[2]
    )
  
  data_filtered <- data.grouped %>% filter(model_lbl == model_str)

  plt.all <- ggline(data = data_filtered, 
                    x = 'partition', y = 'median', color = 'var_lbl', group = 'var_lbl',
               facet.by = c('experiment_lbl', 'model_lbl'),
               add.params = list(color = "var_lbl", size = 1, width = 0.1),
               palette = 'hls', size = 1, plot_type = 'b', alpha = 0.5) +
    geom_ribbon(data = data_filtered, aes(ymin = median_lower, ymax = median_upper,
                                           fill = var_lbl), alpha=0.2, outline.type = 'both')
  
  plt.all <- ggpar(plt.all, ylab = 'OVI', xlab = 'Partition', legend.title = "Variable")
  
  return (plt.all)
}
```
